title: Error Code 004
body:
Since Support is probably gonna take awhile I wanna hear what you guys have to suggest.

I just got a new gaming laptop and can't install LoL.
The client installs fine but it's the patching that fails and brings up the code.

I've tried the following:

* Uninstall-Clean install ( deleted all the subfolders and files too. Also downloaded a new install for good measure )
* Tried repairing from client.
* hextech tool ( fails with a "don't send" error )

LoL is allowed trough my firewall and AV.

If anyone can chip in with any ideas It'd be awesome.

replies.body:
Grats on your new rig!  Since you have a new setup, you'll want to make sure your OS and drivers are current,, which our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide can help with.

Specifically with your error code, that's usually caused by security settings blocking your game files from being read properly.  Looking through your firewall and AV settings are a solid step, but I also recommend going over each step of our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to troubleshoot.  I hope that helps!

OS is up to date.
All the latest drivers are installed.
As I stated above there is nothing in my firewall or AV blocking LoL.
I went through all the steps for permissions and  connectivity.
Hextech tool keeps crashing so that's no help whatsoever.

I put in a support ticket but haven't gotten an answer from them yet.
I only put in the client logs thou.
I'll see what they have to say and I'll attach the hextech logs too.
I sent in the ticket 10 hours ago....nothing...

There is probably something wrong with my setup but I have to sit here and wait for them to have mercy and respond.
Sorry to hear none of this has helped.  :(  What's your ticket number so I can check on the status for you?

TICKET #32328416

Let me know if you need those hextech logs

Thanks!  I was able to verify your ticket was received and fielded to the tech team.  Logs are always helpful, I recommend adding the HRT logs as soon as you can.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can.

Thanks Porocles.
You're my second favourite Rioter now. 
Number one is on NA but a gentlemen doesn't tell ;)
I'll send the hextech logs as soon as I get home.
